title: RansomEye v1.0 Canonical Event Envelope
description: AUTHORITATIVE: Immutable contract for all event envelopes in RansomEye v1.0. This schema is frozen and MUST NOT be modified.

event_id.description: Universally unique identifier for this event. MUST be a valid UUID v4.

machine_id.description: Machine identifier where the event originated. MUST be a non-empty string.

component.description: Component that generated this event. MUST be one of: linux_agent, windows_agent, dpi, core.

component_instance_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific instance of the component. MUST be a non-empty string.

observed_at.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp when the event was observed at the source. MUST be in UTC timezone and RFC3339 format.

ingested_at.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp when the event was ingested into the system. MUST be in UTC timezone and RFC3339 format.

sequence.description: Monotonically increasing sequence number within the component instance. MUST be a 64-bit unsigned integer (0 to 2^64-1).

payload.description: Opaque event payload. Structure is component-specific and not validated by this schema. MUST be a valid JSON object.

hostname.description: Hostname of the machine where the event was observed. MUST be a non-empty string.

boot_id.description: Boot identifier of the machine. Changes on each system boot. MUST be a non-empty string.

agent_version.description: Version string of the agent that generated this event. MUST be a non-empty string.

hash_sha256.description: SHA256 hash of the entire event envelope (computed after all fields are populated). MUST be a 64-character hexadecimal string.

prev_hash_sha256.description: SHA256 hash of the previous event in the sequence. MUST be null for the first event (sequence=0), otherwise MUST be a 64-character hexadecimal string matching the hash_sha256 of the preceding event.

signature.description: Base64-encoded ed25519 signature of the event envelope hash. REQUIRED for telemetry authentication (PHASE 1).

signing_key_id.description: SHA256 hash of the public key used to sign this event. REQUIRED for telemetry authentication (PHASE 1). Used for key rotation support.
